channel.title: How to change a IP in a 317 client? [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey guy's I'm a newbie compared to you guys and I downloaded a source and client but I think the client connects to it's own server, how do I change the IP address so it connects to my IP address? Thanks in advance! BTW it's the one-scape client .
Peace

item.title: How to change a IP in a 317 client? [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @skatersscape skatersscape
item.description:
@skatersscape wrote:

Change the ip in gui.java or client.java (depends on client which files to change)

Read full topic

Do a search for the IP it connects to, and change it.

item.title: How to change a IP in a 317 client? [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

Baha, if it wasn’t for your good grammar i wouldve ignored this. You have to change the ip in the client to YOUR No-ip adress, if you would like i could help you out via teamviewer
